description: Topic: If Statement | Checks whether a number is positive using simple if
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckPositiveNumber.java).
Compile: javac CheckPositiveNumber.java
Run: java CheckPositiveNumber

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store a number.
- If number > 0 then print "Positive Number".
- Otherwise nothing prints because only if is used.

description: Topic: If Statement | Checks whether a number is even using if
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckEvenNumber.java).
Compile: javac CheckEvenNumber.java
Run: java CheckEvenNumber

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store a number.
- If num % 2 == 0, number is even.
- Print even message.

description: Topic: If Statement | Checks if a number is divisible by 10
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckMultipleOf10.java).
Compile: javac CheckMultipleOf10.java
Run: java CheckMultipleOf10

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store a number.
- If num % 10 == 0 then it is divisible by 10.
- Print the result.

description: Topic: If Statement | Checks if the number is exactly zero
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckZero.java).
Compile: javac CheckZero.java
Run: java CheckZero

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store a number.
- If num == 0 then print "Zero".
- Otherwise nothing prints.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks whether a number is even or odd
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., EvenOddChecker.java).
Compile: javac EvenOddChecker.java
Run: java EvenOddChecker

Logic / How Program Works:
- If num % 2 == 0 then it's even.
- Else it's odd.
- Prints the correct result.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks whether a number is positive or negative
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., PositiveNegativeChecker.java).
Compile: javac PositiveNegativeChecker.java
Run: java PositiveNegativeChecker

Logic / How Program Works:
- If num >= 0 then number is positive.
- Else number is negative.
- Prints the result.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks whether a person is eligible to vote
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., VoterEligibilityChecker.java).
Compile: javac VoterEligibilityChecker.java
Run: java VoterEligibilityChecker

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store age.
- If age >= 18 then eligible.
- Else not eligible.
- Prints eligibility message.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks whether student is pass or fail based on marks
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., PassFailChecker.java).
Compile: javac PassFailChecker.java
Run: java PassFailChecker

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store marks.
- If marks >= 33 then pass.
- Else fail.
- Prints the result.

description: Topic: Else-If Ladder | Calculates grade based on marks
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., GradeCalculator.java).
Compile: javac GradeCalculator.java
Run: java GradeCalculator

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store marks.
- Use else-if ladder to check ranges.
- First matching condition prints the grade.
- If marks are low then prints Fail.

description: Topic: Else-If Ladder | Finds the greatest among three numbers
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., GreatestOfThreeNumbers.java).
Compile: javac GreatestOfThreeNumbers.java
Run: java GreatestOfThreeNumbers

Logic / How Program Works:
- Compare a, b, and c.
- Use else-if to find the biggest value.
- Print the greatest number.

description: Topic: Else-If Ladder | Checks whether a character is vowel or consonant
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., VowelConsonantChecker.java).
Compile: javac VowelConsonantChecker.java
Run: java VowelConsonantChecker

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store a character.
- Check if it matches a,e,i,o,u (both cases).
- If yes -> vowel.
- Else -> consonant.

description: Topic: Else-If Ladder | Adds bonus based on employee salary range
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., SalaryBonusSystem.java).
Compile: javac SalaryBonusSystem.java
Run: java SalaryBonusSystem

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store salary.
- If salary >= 50000 -> 20% bonus.
- Else if salary >= 30000 -> 10% bonus.
- Else -> 5% bonus.
- Print final salary with bonus.

description: Topic: Nested If | Checks username and password using nested if
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., SimpleLoginSystem.java).
Compile: javac SimpleLoginSystem.java
Run: java SimpleLoginSystem

Logic / How Program Works:
- First checks username.
- If username is correct, then checks password in nested if.
- If both match -> Login Successful.
- Otherwise prints error message.

description: Topic: Nested If | Checks whether a number is divisible by both 2 and 3
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., DivisibleBy2And3Checker.java).
Compile: javac DivisibleBy2And3Checker.java
Run: java DivisibleBy2And3Checker

Logic / How Program Works:
- First check if number is divisible by 2.
- If true, then check divisibility by 3 inside nested if.
- Prints result based on conditions.

description: Topic: Switch Case | Prints day name based on day number (1-7)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., DayNameFinder.java).
Compile: javac DayNameFinder.java
Run: java DayNameFinder

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store day number.
- Switch checks which case matches.
- That case prints day name.
- break stops further execution.
- default handles invalid input.

description: Topic: Switch Case | Performs +, -, *, / operation using switch
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., SimpleCalculatorUsingSwitch.java).
Compile: javac SimpleCalculatorUsingSwitch.java
Run: java SimpleCalculatorUsingSwitch

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store two numbers and operator.
- Switch matches operator.
- Performs the operation and prints result.
- default handles wrong operator.

description: Topic: Break Statement | Stops loop execution when value reaches 5
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., StopLoopAt5.java).
Compile: javac StopLoopAt5.java
Run: java StopLoopAt5

Logic / How Program Works:
- Loop runs from 1 to 10.
- When i == 5, break exits loop completely.
- Prints numbers only before 5.

description: Topic: Continue Statement | Skips printing number 5 using continue
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., SkipNumber5InLoop.java).
Compile: javac SkipNumber5InLoop.java
Run: java SkipNumber5InLoop

Logic / How Program Works:
- Loop runs from 1 to 10.
- When i == 5, continue skips this iteration.
- Prints all numbers except 5.

description: Topic: Continue Statement | Prints only even numbers from 1 to 10
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., PrintOnlyEvenNumbers.java).
Compile: javac PrintOnlyEvenNumbers.java
Run: java PrintOnlyEvenNumbers

Logic / How Program Works:
- Loop from 1 to 10.
- If number is odd, continue skips printing.
- Even numbers will print only.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks whether a year is a leap year or not
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckLeapYear.java).
Compile: javac CheckLeapYear.java
Run: java CheckLeapYear

Logic / How Program Works:
- A year is leap if (year % 400 == 0) OR (year % 4 == 0 AND year % 100 != 0).
- If condition is true, print Leap Year.
- Otherwise print Not a Leap Year.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks if a character is an alphabet letter or not
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckAlphabetCharacter.java).
Compile: javac CheckAlphabetCharacter.java
Run: java CheckAlphabetCharacter

Logic / How Program Works:
- Character is alphabet if it lies between 'A'-'Z' or 'a'-'z'.
- If true print Alphabet.
- Else print Not an Alphabet.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks if a character is uppercase or lowercase
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckUpperLowerCase.java).
Compile: javac CheckUpperLowerCase.java
Run: java CheckUpperLowerCase

Logic / How Program Works:
- If character is between 'A' and 'Z' -> Uppercase.
- Else if between 'a' and 'z' -> Lowercase.
- Otherwise it is not an alphabet character.

program_name: Check Number is Divisible by 5 and 11
description: Topic: If-Else | Checks divisibility of a number by 5 and 11
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., DivisibleBy5And11.java).
Compile: javac DivisibleBy5And11.java
Run: java DivisibleBy5And11

Logic / How Program Works:
- If num % 5 == 0 AND num % 11 == 0 then divisible by both.
- Else not divisible by both.
- Print result accordingly.

description: Topic: If-Else | Calculates profit or loss based on cost price and selling price
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., ProfitLossCalculator.java).
Compile: javac ProfitLossCalculator.java
Run: java ProfitLossCalculator

Logic / How Program Works:
- If sellingPrice > costPrice -> Profit.
- Else if sellingPrice < costPrice -> Loss.
- Else -> No Profit No Loss.
- Print the result and difference.

description: Topic: Else-If Ladder | Calculates electricity bill based on units consumed
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., ElectricityBillCalculator.java).
Compile: javac ElectricityBillCalculator.java
Run: java ElectricityBillCalculator

Logic / How Program Works:
- If units <= 100 -> rate 1.5 per unit.
- Else if units <= 200 -> rate 2.5 per unit.
- Else if units <= 300 -> rate 3.5 per unit.
- Else -> rate 5 per unit.
- Multiply units with rate and print bill amount.

description: Topic: Else-If Ladder | Applies discount based on shopping amount
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., DiscountCalculator.java).
Compile: javac DiscountCalculator.java
Run: java DiscountCalculator

Logic / How Program Works:
- If amount >= 5000 -> 20% discount.
- Else if amount >= 3000 -> 15% discount.
- Else if amount >= 1000 -> 10% discount.
- Else -> no discount.
- Final amount = amount - discount.
output:
Total Amount = 3500.0
Discount = 525.0
Final Payable Amount = 2975.0

description: Topic: Switch Case | Performs ATM operations like check balance, deposit, withdraw
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., SimpleATMMenu.java).
Compile: javac SimpleATMMenu.java
Run: java SimpleATMMenu

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store initial balance.
- Use a choice variable for menu selection.
- Switch executes selected operation.
- For withdraw, check if balance is sufficient before deducting.

description: Topic: Switch Case | Prints month name based on month number (1-12)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., MonthNameFinder.java).
Compile: javac MonthNameFinder.java
Run: java MonthNameFinder

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store month number.
- Switch checks matching month case.
- Prints the month name.
- default handles invalid month number.

description: Topic: Switch Case | Prints action based on traffic light color using switch
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., TrafficSignalSystem.java).
Compile: javac TrafficSignalSystem.java
Run: java TrafficSignalSystem

Logic / How Program Works:
- Store a string for signal color.
- Switch checks the color.
- Prints action like STOP, READY, GO.
- default handles invalid input.

description: Topic: Break Statement | Adds numbers until sum exceeds 50 and stops using break
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., StopSumExceeds50.java).
Compile: javac StopSumExceeds50.java
Run: java StopSumExceeds50

Logic / How Program Works:
- Loop runs from 1 to 100.
- Add i to sum each time.
- When sum > 50, break stops the loop.
- Prints final sum and where it stopped.

description: Topic: Continue Statement | Skips negative numbers and prints only positives
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., SkipNegativeNumbers.java).
Compile: javac SkipNegativeNumbers.java
Run: java SkipNegativeNumbers

Logic / How Program Works:
- Array contains positive and negative numbers.
- If number < 0, continue skips that number.
- Prints only positive numbers.

description: Topic: Continue Statement | Skips numbers divisible by 3 between 1 to 20
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., SkipMultiplesOf3.java).
Compile: javac SkipMultiplesOf3.java
Run: java SkipMultiplesOf3

Logic / How Program Works:
- Loop from 1 to 20.
- If i % 3 == 0, continue skips printing.
- Prints only numbers not divisible by 3.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks if three angles form a valid triangle
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckValidTriangle.java).
Compile: javac CheckValidTriangle.java
Run: java CheckValidTriangle

Logic / How Program Works:
- A triangle is valid if sum of angles is exactly 180.
- If true print Valid Triangle.
- Else print Invalid Triangle.

description: Topic: If-Else | Checks if three sides form a valid triangle
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., CheckTriangleBySides.java).
Compile: javac CheckTriangleBySides.java
Run: java CheckTriangleBySides

Logic / How Program Works:
- Triangle is valid if sum of any two sides is greater than the third.
- Check all three conditions.
- If true -> Valid Triangle else Invalid Triangle.

description: Topic: Else-If Ladder | Identifies triangle type (Equilateral/Isosceles/Scalene)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., TriangleTypeChecker.java).
Compile: javac TriangleTypeChecker.java
Run: java TriangleTypeChecker

Logic / How Program Works:
- If all sides equal -> Equilateral.
- Else if any two sides equal -> Isosceles.
- Else -> Scalene.
- Prints the triangle type.
